text: aur hamane us aag par niyukt rahanevaalon ko farishte hee banaaya hai, aur hamane unakee sankhya ko inakaar karanevaalon ke lie museebat aur aazamaish hee banaakar rakha hai. taaki ve log jinhen kitaab pradaan kee gaee thee poorn vishvaas praapt karen, aur ve log jo eemaan le aae ve eemaan mein aur aage badh jaen. aur jin logon ko kitaab pradaan kee gaee ve aur eemaanavaale kisee sanshay me na pade, aur taaki jinake dilon me rog hai ve aur inakaar karanevaale kahen, "is varnan se allaah ka kya abhipraay hai?" is prakaar allaah jise chaahata hai pathabhrasht kar deta hai aur jise chaahata hain sammaarg pradaan karata hai. aur tumhaare rab kee senaon ko svayan usake siva koee nahin jaanata, aur yah to manushy ke lie maatr ek shiksha-saamagree hai
